scReadSim.scATAC_GenerateBAM.scATAC_PerTruePeakEdition¶

scReadSim.scATAC_GenerateBAM.scATAC_PerTruePeakEdition(peak_record, count_vec, read_lines, random_cellbarcode_list, read_len=50, jitter_size=5)[source]¶

Formulate Synthetic reads.

Parameters

  • peak_record (numpy.array) – Coordinates of a query peak.

  • count_vec (numpy.array) –

  • vector of the query peak. (Count) –

  • read_lines (pandas.dataframe) – Coordinates of synthetic reads sampled from the input BAM file.

  • random_cellbarcode_list (list) –

  • of cell barcodes randomly generated using cellbarode_generator() (List) –

  • read_len (int (default: ‘50’)) – Specify the length of synthetic reads. Default value is 50 bp.

  • jitter_size (int (default: ‘5’)) – Specify the range of random shift to avoid replicate synthetic reads. Default value is 5 bp.

Returns

  • read_1_df (pandas.dataframe) – Coordinates of synthetic read 1 generated for the query peak.

  • read_2_df (pandas.dataframe) – Coordinates of synthetic read 2 generated for the query peak.
